startscreen.title: Rollsroller
startscreen.info:
This app is here to help you with your flatbed applicator. 

You can find information about all different applicators and if you log in you can connect to your own one. 

In case you need support, you can find help in the side menu. You can also find more about us under Social Media.

menu.confirmationtext: Are you sure you want to log out?

login.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 12 characters long.

myapplicatorsettings.name: Name:
myapplicatorsettings.duplicatetext: Can not have the same name of applicators.
myapplicatorsettings.confirmationtext: Are you sure you want to remove this applicator?

newapplicator.title: New applicator
newapplicator.duplicatemodaltext: Can not have the same name of applicators.
newapplicator.emptymodaltext: Must put a value in every field.

connection.modaltext: Could not connect to the applicator. Check it is turned on and if the IP is correct.

applicatordescription.entrytable: ROLLSROLLER ENTRY is our entry model of Flatbed Applicator. Delivered flat packed for access to almost any sign shop environment. Fast setup and low investment cost gives you access to the ROLLSROLLER flatbed production method today.
applicatordescription.inventortable: WANT TO GO FOR GOLD? LET ROLLSROLLERÂ® INVENTOR EDITION TAKE YOUR SIGN COMPANY TO THE NEXT LEVEL.
applicatordescription.premiumtable: ROLLSROLLER PREMIUM is the origin of Flatbed Applicators and a benchmark for this technology. Premium is our best seller, made to meet the needs of high volume industrial production. Premium is equipped with side trays for rolls of banner media, which makes it ideal for flex-face sign applications.
applicatordescription.regulartable: ROLLSROLLER REGULAR is our standard model of Flatbed Applicator. It has a wide range of options available. Pneumatically controlled roller which is automatically adjusted for substrates up to 60 mm (2 2/5in).

support.formproblem: On which applicator table does the problem occur?
